EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited to the Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference - Rotortech 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
2018 Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference
Dear Valued Customer, Honeywell is proud to announce the 2018 Asia Pacific Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference on Wednesday, May 23rd, hosted on the Sunshine Coast of Queensland Australia. The event is being held in conjunction with RotorTech 2018. We hope you can join us to learn more about Honeywell’s product and service offerings.
Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference, Asia Pacific Date: Wednesday, May 23, 2018 Time: 9:30 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. Location: Novotel Twin Waters Resort <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Novotel%20Twin%20Waters%20Resort%20Map%202018.pdf]]> Lily’s on the Lagoon 270 Ocean Drive, Sunshine Coast, Queensland, Australia
Our conference will provide:
- An overview of the commercial helicopter business
- Technical briefings on Honeywell connectivity and communication suites
- Honeywell’s latest product and support offerings
- LTS101 & HTS900 engine technical briefings
- Q&A with Honeywell industry experts
Limited seats are available. To ensure you reserve your seat today, please RSVP soonest.
REGISTER TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_HOC_Rotortech.html]]>
To schedule a meeting with us at ROTORTECH, please contact Michael Keat, michael.keat@honeywell.com <[[mailto:michael.keat@honeywell.com]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
Derek Lockett Regional Sales Director Honeywell International Inc. Defense & Space Asia Pacific (DAP)
Note: This event is by invitation only. Please do not forward this message.
